original_text: Then he said to me, “Have you seen this, O son of man? Is it too light a thing for the house of Judah to commit the abominations that they commit here, that they should fill the land with violence and provoke me still further to anger? Behold, they put the branch to their nose.
korean_text: 또 내게 이르시되 인자야 네가 보았느냐 유다 족속이 여기에서 행한 가증한 일을 적다 하겠느냐 그들이 그 땅을 폭행으로 채우고 또 다시 내 노여움을 일으키며 심지어 나뭇가지를 그 코에 두었느니라

sentences.original_text: Is it too light a thing for the house of Judah
to commit the abominations that they commit here,
that they should fill the land with violence
and provoke me still further to anger?
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 더욱 격노하게 하는 것이 너무 가벼운 일이냐?

sentences.original_text: they put the branch to their nose.
